titles: The Jewish Sabbath abrogated, or, The Saturday Sabbatarians confuted in two parts : first, proving the abrogation of the old seventh-day Sabbath : secondly, that the Lord's-Day is of divine appointment : containing several sermons newly preach'd upon a special occasion, wherein are many new arguments not found in former authors / by Benjamin Keach.
author: Keach, Benjamin, 1640-1704.
publisher: Printed and sold by John Marshall ...,
notes: Pages from beginning to p. 91 and 150-169 photographed from Yale University copy and inserted at the end.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
